oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Information about various different peoples and other groups of !kun (or !ku) found in !nanni and Tamme's country. There is a list of these groups of peoples and their differences and similarities. 1) See also The song of the !korro-ssin !ku and A song of the |kam-ssin !ku (or Sun Bushmen) and Tamme's family and their understanding of the languages spoken in their country, 2) p.9177v: see Food eaten by the !kun (respect for the wild cat); how eating it causes pain in the head, 3) 9181v: see A song of the |kam-ssin !ku (or Sun Bushmen), 4) This story is found in Book XI & XII-3.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Different peoples and Bushmen in !nanni and Tamme's country
